xxl.core.relational.query.expressions
Class Tables

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.relational.query.expressions.Tables

public class Tables
extends Object

This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a table node in a directed acyclic graph. Beside these methods, it contains constants for identifying local metadata fragments inside an expression node's global metadata, methods for accessing them and local metadata factories for updating them.

See Also:
Node

Field Summary
static String EXPRESSION_TYPE
          This constant can be used to denote that a node represents a table in the directed acyclic graph.
static String SCHEMA_NAME
          This constant is used to identify the table's schema name inside its global metadata.
static String TABLE_NAME
          This constant is used to identify the column's name inside its global metadata.
static Function<Object,MetaDataFunction<Tuple,? extends Object,CompositeMetaData<Object,Object>>> TRANSLATION_FUNCTION
          A factory method that can be used to translate a table expression into an appropriate implementation.
static Function<Object,Node> XML_READER
          A factory method that can be used to transform the XML representation of a table expression into the node itself.
static Function<Object,Node> XML_WRITER
          A factory method that can be used to transform a table expression into its XML representation.
 
Method Summary
static String getCanonicalName(Node expression)
          Returns the canonical name of the given table expression, i.e, the name given by the table expression's schema name and table name.
static String getSchemaName(Node expression)
          Returns the schema name of the given table expression.
static String getTableName(Node expression)
          Returns the table name of the given table expression.
static Node newTable(String tableName)
          Creates a new table expression representing the table named tableName.
static Node newTable(String schemaName, String tableName)
          Creates a new table expression representing the table named schemaName.

newTable

public static final Node newTable(String schemaName,
                                  String tableName)
Creates a new table expression representing the table named schemaName.tableName.

Parameters:
schemaName - the name of the schema providing the table's table.
tableName - the name of the table.
Returns:
a new column expression representing the table named schemaName.tableName.
